page.title: 09House Prices in Bilbrough
page.content: The price of housing in Bilbrough reflects the inflation of the last 20 years.Many new houses have been built since the war.The earlier ones 3/4 bedroomed detached houses in brick originally cost between Â£5000 and Â£8000.They sell now at Â£50 000 plus. The larger ones costing Â£10 000 to Â£12 000 have increased in price like wise. The Executive type houses currently being built are in the Â£80 000 to Â£90 000 range.None of these have much land.An older house in the village once part of the old orphanage has just been sold for Â£130 000.It had been modernised.The Manor House now on the market is priced at Â£300 000 for the house and outbuildings alone.The estate land can be bought separately.
